Name: Steven
description:
Steven is a resident of Kayonza, aged 43 years. He is married with four children who all go to school. He is a farmer who has practiced farming for the past 20 years.

He is hardworking and devotes his entire time at the farm to harvesting quality bananas. Steven is seeking a loan to buy fertilizers, manure and mulch for his farm. He will then improve on his soil nutrition so he can harvest good-quality bananas, which will be competed for in the market. Thank you funders.
